data.description: Key Features of AW Bellies Sandals Wedges Heel Casuals,AW Bellies Price: Rs. 499 Material: Synthetic Lifestyle: Casual Heel Type: Wedge Warranty Type: Manufacturer Product Warranty against manufacturing defects: 30 days Care instructions: Allow your pair of shoes to air and de-odorize at regular basis; use shoe bags to prevent any stains or mildew; dust any dry dirt from the surface using a clean cloth; do not use polish or shiner,Specifications of AW Bellies General Ideal For Women Occasion Casual Shoe Details Color Red Outer Material Patent Leather Heel Height 1 inch Number of Contents in Sales Package Pack of 1 In the Box One Pair Of Shoes
